description: Relatives of those held anxiously wait to see if their loved ones will be among the captives freed.
maintext: "We were all supposed to go to Kibbutz Be'eri to visit my wife's brother, but at the last minute the boys decided to stay at home and the girls went away. The next thing we knew there was a big mess in the south, and they were declared as missing - for the first two weeks - and then we got the 'kidnapped' status."
title: Gaza hostages deal: 'Until I see them with my own eyes I won't believe anything'
